title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Wenjuinn Png
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 173 – February 2021 Cover Art Forward Wenjuinn Png is an independent artist and former graphic designer. He has provided illustrations for various game developers and his most notable works include the Panty Warriors and Bubblegum Space series. Issue 173 – February 2021
Cover Art
Forward
Wenjuinn Png is an independent artist and former graphic designer. He has provided illustrations for various game developers and his most notable works include the Panty Warriors and Bubblegum Space series.
